summary: Action required: fix Workload Identity Federation (WIF) support role to maintain SRE support
description: Your Workload Identity Federation (WIF) cluster requires you to take action because Red Hat OpenShift SRE are not able to access your GCP account due to missing permissions ${PERMISSIONS} in the support role that prevents SRE from supporting your cluster. Please fix the support role to maintain ongoing cluster support by running 'ocm gcp update wif-config'.
